@@ -484,20 +500,17 @@ class BCEWithLogitsLoss(_Loss):
         >>> output = loss(input, target)
         >>> output.backward()

body: This will break backward compatibility. We need to implement `__setattr__`, and some extra care around state dicts might be necessary too.
